Human Resource Officer Job at OgbeniHR




        
    

        
        OgbeniHR is a people-focused HR solutions provider helping businesses and professionals grow. We specialize in recruitment, CV revamps, training, payroll, compliance, and HR outsourcing. With a fast-track hiring process, we fill roles within 3 to 7 days. Our goal is simple: to make HR seamless, practical, and growth-driven.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Officer 
Job Location: Maitama, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time



Key Responsibilities


	Support day-to-day HR operations including recruitment, onboarding, and employee documentation.
	Assist in implementing HR policies and ensuring compliance with company standards.
	Coordinate training, performance appraisals, and employee engagement activities.
	Maintain accurate HR records and prepare periodic reports.
	Support management in handling employee relations and welfare initiatives.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	2–4 years of HR experience, preferably in service, automotive, or technical environments.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and organisational skills.
	Working knowledge of HR practices, labour laws, and HR software tools.
	High level of professionalism, confidentiality, and attention to detail.




What We Offer


	A dynamic and inclusive work environment.
	Opportunities for learning and professional growth.
	Competitive compensation and benefits.
	The chance to be part of a forward-thinking team redefining automotive service delivery in Nigeria.




Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv.ogbenihr@gmail.com using “HR Officer” as the subject of the email.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Supervisor
Job Location: Mowe, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 1 - 4 years of experience.

title: Job Vacancies at Bukka Hut Restaurant
content:
Bukka Hut Restaurant is a fast-growing organization with almost 20 outlets in Lagos and care greatly about our staff. Beyond hospitality, Bukka Hut thrives as a people-centric brand with a laser focus on championing people empowerment initiatives. We like to view our business sectors as channels used to transform the lives of our stakeholders. This stems from our internal workforce to the community we operate in.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Restaurant Supervisor

Job Location: Lekki, Chisco - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

 Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Be visible in the Front of house to address all customer issues and frontliner are always smiling and well-coordinated.
	Effectively supervises subordinates to ensure that all required products are available in line with the product time-out schedule and are well presented for customers to see.
	Proactively identify and resolves issues that could adversely affect product availability for display.
	Ensure timely requisition of products to avoid outage.
	Effectively supervises staff to prevent product or cash shortage
	Enforce our standard operations procedure and supervises staff for compliance
	Effectively supervises staff to ensure there are no shortages and if there are any shortages, carry out an investigation to identify the causes and resolve immediately.
	Ensure equipment such as microwave, chillers, P.O.S, and computers are well handled by staff to prevent any damages that could affect smooth operations.
	Submit required reports as at when due.
	Ensure shift closing procedure is well observed by checking cash out from cashiers at the end of shifts, ensuring no trash is outside dumpster, turn off TV and/or music, dining area is swept, tables reset and chairs neatly arranged, turn off all light and doors are locked.


Requirements


	Have a Bachelor's Degree or HND in Hospitality or any related field.
	2 - 3 years of work experience in a QSR business.
	Good communication skills.
	Excellent leadership skills.
	Smart and proactiveness.
	Candidates must reside within Lekki and its environment.


Application Closing Date: 20th November, 2025.

Method of Appliction 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using "Restaurant Supervisor" as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Kitchen Supervisor (Restaurant)

Job Locations: Lekki, Ikota & Ilasan - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

 Responsibilities


	Carry out effective supervision of all production process in line with cGMP or standard requirements.
	Plan and execute production activities to meet the target are met in volume.
	Ensure wastages are reduced to the barest minimum percentage set by the management.
	Carry out proper checks on all supplies i.e raw materials e.t.c to ensure they meet the specification given.
	Carry our regular stock inventory to prevent stock out.
	Give regular production report to the line Manager e.t.c.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc in Food Technology or related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of working experience in a similar capacity.
	Must have experience in food production
	Ability to co-ordinate production process without supervision.
	Ability to forecast production trends.
	Attention to details.
	Candidates must reside within Lekki, Chisc, Ikota and its environs.


Salary 
N120,000 - N130,000 per month.

Application Closing Date: 15th November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using "Kitchen Supervisor" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Cook

Job Locations: Ikoyi Plaza, Ikota, Blenco and Chevron - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties


	A Cook plans, prepares, and cooks food items to ensure the highest quality service and experience for customers.
	They help keep the kitchen organized and running efficiently.
	They ensure proper food handling, sanitation and following food storage procedures.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a minimum of SSCE / GCE / NECO qualification.
	1 - 2 years of work experience.
	Good communication skills (Verbal and written).
	Candidates must reside within Lekki/ Ikota and its environment.
	Applicant must be able to work at night.


Salary
N80,000 - N90,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 15th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using "Cook" as the subject of the email.
